FAQ

Is my image sent to a server?

No. All processing happens locally in your browser.

What image formats are supported?

We support JPEG and PNG formats for compression.

How does compression work?

Compression reduces file size by adjusting quality settings. Lower quality means smaller files but may reduce image quality.
